description: This file defines the external API for ASN.1 CertificateRequest objects and related structures, including function declarations for creating and generating PKCS#10 requests, along with licensing and documentation comments.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateCertificateRequest
methods.description: Creates a new CertificateRequest ASN.1 object, reserving resources as needed.

methods.name: AnscAsn1GeneratePKCS10Request
methods.description: Generates a PKCS#10 certificate signing request using provided attributes and key pair.

methods.name: AnscAsn1GenPKCS10RequestWithCryptoAPI
methods.description: Generates a PKCS#10 request with a specified cryptographic API.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateCertificationRequestInfo
methods.description: Creates a new CertificationRequestInfo ASN.1 object.
